name: ZombiesGraveyard
description:
Zombies game were you fight zombies in closed area for endless waves. You can upgrade your player and weapons, Inspired from COD:Zombies.

*The game does not save data.

*was not tested on linux

hope you enjoy it, and thanks for playing.

if you liked the game, please follow and rate

for contact or feedback: gamesdevs@zoho.com

Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/Alpha_Dragon

Version:1.0
